discoverCollection: Discover our premium collection of building materials and luxury finishes

hero.title: AL Amodi Group
hero.subtitle: Pioneer in Building Materials Supply Since 1957 - Your Trusted Partner in Doha, Qatar

intro.description: Based in Doha, Qatar, AL Amodi Group is the pioneer of direct supply and distribution of branded international building materials from all over the world. Family-owned since 1957, the parent company AL Amodi Store is an innovative company rooted in a time-honored tradition.

overlay.title: Quality Building Materials
overlay.subtitle: Trusted by professionals across Qatar for over 6 decades

category.title: Explore Our
category.subtitle: Categories
category.description: Discover our comprehensive range of building materials, from luxury sanitary ware to modern kitchen solutions. Each category features premium brands trusted worldwide.
